General.Name: Tourism Enterprise Co.
General.Description: Tourism Enterprises Co. engages in the managing of tourism buildings in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company manages chalets, motels, hotels, parks, restaurants, cities, playgrounds, swimming pools, rest houses, central service stations, and other services. It owns and operates the Palm Beach Resort. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: P.O Box Number 8383, Dammam, Saudi Arabia, 31482
